headquarters.note: Listed as Boston with office in Lexington, MA

parent_company.note: Acquired by Huron Consulting Group in 2017

offices.note: US office in Boston, also has offices in Singapore and Zurich

specialties.note: Growth, innovation, portfolio management, disruptive innovation, strategy, business transformation, innovation capabilities

industries.note: Healthcare, technology, financial services, consumer goods, energy

known_for.note: Co-founded by Clayton Christensen, disruptive innovation theory, works with 1/3 of Fortune 50

hires_ug.note: MC shows 5 offices suggesting analyst hiring, though not explicitly stated

hires_mba.note: MBA/PhD compensation listed on MC profile

travel.note: Estimated as moderate based on boutique strategy firm profile

work_hours.note: Estimated as demanding based on strategy consulting nature

recruiting.process.note: First round: 2x30-min cases + fit. Second round: 5-hour group case + partner interview

recruiting.unique.note: Group case exercise with observation, candidate-led cases, strategic thinking focus

byu.alumni_all_time.note: 35 alumni shown on LinkedIn BYU alumni page

byu.alumni_current.note: 2 current employees in 'Where they work' section

byu.pipeline.note: 35 all-time but only 2 current suggests alumni_only rather than active recruiting

gaps.reason: No undergraduate compensation data found on Management Consulted or other sources. Glassdoor shows analyst salaries around $85-88k but couldn't confirm if these are UG vs MBA analysts.

notes: Management Consulted profile was comprehensive with clear compensation data for MBA hires and good overview of the firm. Founded by Clayton Christensen (author of The Innovator's Dilemma) in 2000, acquired by Huron in 2017. LinkedIn showed 35 all-time BYU alumni with only 2 currently at the firm, suggesting the firm doesn't actively recruit at BYU. Glassdoor and web searches provided good interview process details including the unique group case format. No undergraduate compensation data was availableâ€”MC only listed MBA/PhD level. The firm is known for disruptive innovation theory and Jobs-to-be-Done framework.
